experiencia.title: Experience
experiencia.description: Passionate about front-end, I enjoy creating small projects with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I love developing new things and keeping up-to-date with UX and UI Design.

empresa1.texto: Development and maintenance of a mobile app using React Native and Expo. Completion and development of new features for the company's dashboard using React.js and Redux.

empresa2.texto: AssisteAê is a platform to help you find something to watch and where to watch it. This is a personal project I created to apply some React.js concepts.

empresa3.texto: I participated in customer support within technical assistance, carrying out some specific development tasks.

empresa4.texto: This was a project focused on the national agribusiness sector. I actively participated from prototyping to coding all the screens.

formacao.title: Education
formacao.texto: I started in programming through Resilia Educação, but I am constantly improving myself through intensive online courses focusing on Front-end and UI/UX Design.

footer.contact: I am available for new projects. Get in touch and let's schedule a conversation.
